scripts.electron: SET NODE_ENV=development && npm run express-build && electron ./main.js
scripts.dev-init: cd ../express && npm install && cd ../electron && npm install && cd ../express && gulp move && cd ../electron/express && npm install && npm run rebuild && cd ../../express && npm run build
scripts.prod-init: cd ../express &&  npm install --production && npm prune --production && cd ../electron && npm install --production && npm prune --production && cd ../express && gulp move && cd ../electron/express && npm install --production && npm prune --production && npm run rebuild && cd ../../express && npm run build
